sentences.en: She was trapped in a downward spiral of personal unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 她陷入了个人不幸的旋涡难以自拔。

sentences.en: Failure will lead to unhappiness in life.
sentences.cn: 失败会导致生活中的不幸。

sentences.en: That's a condemnation of the students as a whole, and doesn't explain all campus unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 这是对学生整体的谴责，并不能解释所有校园的不快。
